##Data input

###File characteristics
1. Formats: All inputs must be in `.csv` format. It has been sent to me in `.xlsx` format in the past and I have converted that into .csv or loaded as excel sheet. But this version of the file will only take it in as a .csv file. In case the starting point is an `.xlsx` file convert it to `.csv`.
2. All new data must be placed in "data" folder with the following names
        


```{r, message=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse); library(readxl); library(stringr)

##Load the excel file with the data
oldRowLabelData <- read_csv("Archive/raw data Oct/interventionTypes.csv")
oldColLabelData <- read_csv("Archive/raw data Oct/jobTypes.csv")
oldData <- read_excel("Archive/raw data Oct/BBL_Data_Visualization Tool_M&E All Outputs.xlsx", sheet = "M & E_Outputs", skip = 2)

newData <- read_csv("data/rawJobsData.csv")

oldProjectChars <- oldData %>% 
        select(1:23)

projectChars <- newData %>% 
        select(1:23)

oldCountData <- oldData %>% 
        select(1, 230:242)

newCountData <- newData %>% 
        select(1, 230:242)

oldMoneyData <- oldData %>% 
        select(1, 230, 264:275)

newMoneyData <- newData %>% 
        select(1, 230, 243:254)


identical(names(newCountData), names(oldCountData))


identical(names(projectChars), names(oldProjectChars))

newMoneyData
```
